body:
**Description**


A common pattern that we are observing right now when using it is the following:
```bash
curl https://my.domain/ca_chain > ~/ca.pem
export TEMPORAL_CLI_TLS_CA=~/ca.pem
tctl ...
```

Which could be simplified to:

```bash
export TEMPORAL_CLI_TLS_CA=https://my.domain/ca_chain
tctl ...
```


**Describe the solution you'd like**

Be able to load the CA certificate from a URL, in addition to from a file.
title: tctl: support URL's for $TEMPORAL_CLI_TLS_CA
